thread.title: Coca-Cola calls on Blatter to resign now
thread.title_full: Coca-Cola calls on Blatter to resign now

title: Coca-Cola calls on Blatter to resign now
text:
> Business Coca-Cola calls on Blatter to resign now FIFA-President Sepp Blatter sits in an office of the FIFA headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. Blatter told his staff on Monday he has done "nothing illegal or improper" and has no immediate plans to step down. (AP Photo/Michael Probst) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
